title: Trump order aims to cut PBS and NPR funding
shortDescription: President Donald Trump signed an executive order to stop directly funding PBS and NPR.

title: Trump looks to cut $163 billion in new budget proposal: reports
shortDescription: Trump was expected to release a budget proposal outlining $163 billion in spending cuts that mirrored recommendations from Elon Musk and DOGE.

title: Trump wants to rename Veterans Day: Here's what he wants to call it
shortDescription: Here's why President Trump is pushing to rename Veterans Day, a federal holiday recognized each year on Nov. 11.

title: Trump signs executive order that aims to cut funding for PBS and NPR
shortDescription: The order instructs the Corporation for Public Broadcasting, which distributes funding to PBS and NPR stations, to "cease direct funding" to them.

title: Birthday bash: President Trump and Army plan June 14 parade
shortDescription: Plans for the parade include 6,000 soldiers, helicopters and armored vehicles, such as Strykers, Bradley Fighting Vehicles and possibly Abrams tanks.

title: Trump says to 'think big,' slams Biden in Alabama graduation speech
shortDescription: Trump urged students graduating from the University of Alabama to "never give up." He also slammed Biden and judges blocking his immigration agenda.

title: Trump delivers commencement address at University of Alabama
shortDescription: President Donald Trump delivered the commencement at the University of Alabama Thursday, his first speech to graduates of his second term.

title: Trump taps Mike Waltz for UN ambassador
shortDescription: President Donald Trump nominated former National Security Advisor Mike Waltz as U.N. ambassador after he left his post amid “Signalgate.”

title: Trump approval ratings: See latest polls after president marks 100 days
shortDescription: On the campaign trail, the economy was seen as one of Trump's strengths. But recently, it's been a driving force in lower approval ratings.

title: Experts warn Trump aims to profit while in office
shortDescription: Trump has blurred traditional lines, seeking personal wealth through crypto, real estate, Truth Social and branded merchandise during his presidency.

title: Trump asks Supreme Court to strip Venezuelan migrants of protection
shortDescription: The Trump administration wants Supreme Court to intervene, stripping 300,000-plus Venezuelan migrants of protected status.

title: Trump's stablecoin chosen for $2 billion Abu Dhabi investment
shortDescription: Donald Trump's World Liberty Financial crypto venture was reportedly picked for $2 billion investment in crypto exchange Binance.

title: Who said it? Guess who said these quotes from Trump's first 100 days
shortDescription: Can you guess who said each of these quotes from the beginning of Trump’s second term?

title: Trump discusses separation of church and state
shortDescription: President Donald Trump signed an executive order and discussed church and state separation during National Prayer Day.

title: Trump admin calls trans healthcare 'junk science'
shortDescription: The Trump administration released a report saying there's a lack of evidence to support gender-affirming care. LGBTQ+ advocates call it "troubling."

title: What to know about Trump's major reshuffling of national security team
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has named Mike Waltz as his next nominee for the U.S. ambassador to the UN after ousting him as his national security adviser.

title: Mike Waltz to exit White House amid Signal chat fallout
shortDescription: National Security Advisor Mike Waltz is set to leave his White House post following continued fallout from a Signal messaging mishap involving top Trump administration officials.

title: May Day protests against the Trump admin expected today nationwide
shortDescription: Protests planned coast-to-coast today aim to challenge the Trump administration over its policies on things like immigration, job cuts, and more.

title: Trump cannot use Alien Enemies Act to deport Venezuelans, judge rules
shortDescription: Trump officials exceeded the scope of an 18th-century wartime law to deport some Venezuelan migrants, a federal judge in Texas said, halting its use.

title: 'Love to see' Trump puts name behind Stephen A. Smith for president
shortDescription: The ESPN personality has "great entertainment skills"' Trump said during a town hall that featured Smith
